list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I had already gone when Tom arrived
I don’t want that book – I’ve read it already.
He hasn’t gone already, has he?

list_ex_of_english: One of the strengths of the project is the multiagency approach and many working links have already been made.
Use a multiagency/collaborative approach and build on links already made.
By the mid 1990s payroll taxes already exceeded 25 % in many areas, to cover current costs.
The present work has already been put to such use.
The reader may observe that polymorphism is already being exploited in this paper all along.
Twenty-six per cent of the women had already used the pill and a further 19% were considering its use in the future.
A wide range of such devices are already at the prototype stage.
Also, both of these rules are instances of more general rules already considered.
